links.description: If you've had Apple products since the early days of the iPod, you're probably used to hoarding cables and then having to just put them in a box in the back of your closet every time you get a new device. First there was FireWire, then Apple's 30-pin connector, and most recently, its Lighting cable,...

messages.body: $AAPL #Apple Could Bundle Its Media Offerings into One Subscription https://finance.yahoo.com/m/f7297020-8d1e-382b-825a-21113deb927b/ss_apple-could-bundle-its-media.html

links.title: Apple Could Bundle Its Media Offerings into One Subscription
links.description: Apple (AAPL) has signed deals with several high-profile actors and producers to boost its content subscription. According to a report by The Information, Apple could bundle all its media offerings into one subscription. Apple's current media subscription, Apple Music, currently has more than 40.0 million subscribers.
